name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary: Senior Frontend Engineer with 10+ years of experience delivering high-performance, user-centric software solutions. Expert in modern frontend technologies including **React**, **Redux**, **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **HTML5**, **CSS3**, and proficient in **Node.js** for backend integration. Strong advocate for best practices in **Unit Testing**, **Responsive Design**, and code quality using tools like **ESLint** and **Prettier**. Proven track record in developing and maintaining scalable applications, with a keen focus on creating engaging user experiences. Experienced in cloud-native application deployment on **Azure** and **AWS**, and the application of microservices architecture to enhance system robustness. Additionally, brings a strong background in **MLOps**, emphasizing collaboration and impact-driven results. Aiming to leverage seasoned technical skills to contribute effectively to innovative projects.
